name: Snail Trek - Chapter 2: A Snail Of Two Worlds
description: Relive 1980s nostalgia in this text parser driven graphic adventure game. You and your molluscan crew embark on an epic journey to find a new home world. In Chapter 2 - A Snail Of Two Worlds, you are stranded on an alien planet searching for food, water, and most of all... answers.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
